title: Best of The Program | Guests: Tammy Bruce & Dr. Scott Atlas | 9/9/21
description:
The Biden administration insists inflation rates are normal … when you ignore where they aren’t. The National Archives has put trigger warnings on America’s founding documents. Columnist Tammy Bruce joins to argue that the State Department is allowing a “hostage situation” in Afghanistan to continue. Dr. Scott Atlas discusses how leftists have ruined “the science” and gives his opinion on ivermectin.


Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
